description:
Full matrix of Client ISPs and MLab Server comparisons.

NB: This is a pre-release subject to changes, including deletion, without notification.  It is not running on production infrastructure and may be unstable.

options.content:
# Metro Details Dashboard 

### NB: This is a pre-release of research software.

It is not running on production infrastructure so it is subject to change or deletion without notification and may be unstable.

Show the detailed performance statistics between the top N client ISPs and all MLab sites in the selected metro.
The first three rows are aggregated: metro wide, by server or by Client ISP.

The rest of the dashboard show the performace statics individually between each of the top N Client ISPs and all MLab servers.

Under ideal conditions each Client ISP will have identical performance to each MLab site.

For more information see the [slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1wpx45K30QD2ZIDuS5WsuRGrbcCrxs56cvuhydWRIRiw/edit?usp=sharing).

panels.title: Summary Statistics -- Aggregated by the entire metro, MLab Sites and Client ISPs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *
FROM (
  SELECT metro, ISPrank, tests, percent,
  CONCAT(REGEXP_REPLACE(ISPname, '^0 ', ""), " summary")AS ISPname,
  FROM `${dataset}.cached_metro_report`("MinRTT", "${site:regex}", ${rank})
  WHERE level like "Metro%%"  
    UNION ALL
  SELECT metro, ISPrank, tests, percent, ISPname
  FROM `${dataset}.cached_metro_report`("MinRTT", "${site:regex}", ${rank})
  WHERE level like "ISP%%" 
)  ORDER BY ISPrank

panels.title: Summary Statistics for the top $rank ISPs

targets.rawSql:
WITH
data  AS (
  SELECT
    bin,
    SUM(hist) as hist,
    metro
  FROM `${dataset}.access_ndt7_cached_histograms`("MinRTT",  "${site:regex}", 900)
  GROUP BY metro, bin
)

SELECT
  bin,
  CASE "$mode"
    WHEN "pdf" THEN hist / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by metro)
    WHEN "peak" THEN hist / MAX(hist) OVER (partition by metro)
    ELSE SUM(hist) OVER (PARTITION BY metro ORDER BY bin ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by metro)
  END AS data,
  FORMAT("%t (%t tests)",metro,  SUM(hist) OVER (partition by metro)) AS metro
FROM data
ORDER BY bin

panels.title: Aggregate minRTT for all clients using sites in ${site:raw}

targets.rawSql:
WITH
data  AS (
  SELECT
    bin,
    SUM(hist) as hist,
    metro
  FROM `${dataset}.access_ndt7_cached_histograms`("MeanThroughputMbps",  "${site:regex}", 900)
  GROUP BY metro, bin
)

SELECT
  bin,
  CASE "$mode"
    WHEN "pdf" THEN hist / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by metro)
    WHEN "peak" THEN hist / MAX(hist) OVER (partition by metro)
    ELSE SUM(hist) OVER (PARTITION BY metro ORDER BY bin ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by metro)
  END AS data,
  FORMAT("%t (%t tests)",metro,  SUM(hist) OVER (partition by metro)) AS metro
FROM data
ORDER BY bin

panels.title: Aggregate Download Mbps for all clients using sites in ${site:raw}

targets.rawSql:
WITH
data  AS (
  SELECT
    linBin,
    SUM(hist) as hist,
    siteName
  FROM `${dataset}.access_ndt7_cached_histograms`("linearMinRTT",  "${site:regex}", 900)
  GROUP BY linBin, siteName
)

SELECT
  linBin,
  CASE "$mode"
    WHEN "pdf" THEN hist / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
    WHEN "peak" THEN hist / MAX(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
    ELSE SUM(hist) OVER (PARTITION BY siteName ORDER BY linBin ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
  END AS data,
  FORMAT("%t (%t tests)",siteName,  SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)) AS siteName
FROM data
ORDER BY linBin

panels.title: Download MinRTT (linear mS) per Site for all Clients

targets.rawSql:
WITH
data  AS (

    bin,
    SUM(hist) as hist,
    siteName
  FROM `${dataset}.access_ndt7_cached_histograms`("MinRTT",  "${site:regex}", 900)
  GROUP BY bin, siteName
)

SELECT
  bin,
  CASE "$mode"
    WHEN "pdf" THEN hist / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
    WHEN "peak" THEN hist / MAX(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
    ELSE SUM(hist) OVER (PARTITION BY siteName ORDER BY bin ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
  END AS data,
  FORMAT("%t (%t tests)",siteName,  SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)) AS siteName
FROM data
ORDER BY bin

panels.title: Download MinRTT (mS) per Site for all Clients

targets.rawSql:
WITH
data  AS (
  SELECT
    bin,
    SUM(hist) as hist,
    siteName
  FROM `${dataset}.access_ndt7_cached_histograms`("MeanThroughputMbps",  "${site:regex}", 900)
  GROUP BY bin, siteName
)

SELECT
  bin,
  CASE "$mode"
    WHEN "pdf" THEN hist / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
    WHEN "peak" THEN hist / MAX(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
    ELSE SUM(hist) OVER (PARTITION BY siteName ORDER BY bin ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
  END AS data,
  FORMAT("%t (%t tests)",siteName,  SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)) AS siteName,
FROM data
ORDER BY bin

panels.title: Download Mbps per Site for all Clients

targets.rawSql:
WITH

ISPdata AS (
  SELECT
    linBin,
    SUM(hist) AS hist,
    ISPname,
    ISPrank
  FROM `${dataset}.access_ndt7_cached_histograms`('linearMinRTT', "${site:regex}", ${rank})
  GROUP BY ISPname, ISPrank, linBin
)

SELECT linBin,
    CASE "$mode"
      WHEN "pdf" THEN hist / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by ISPname)
      WHEN "peak" THEN hist / MAX(hist) OVER (partition by ISPname)
      ELSE SUM(hist) OVER (PARTITION BY ISPname ORDER BY linBin ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by ISPname)
    END AS data,
    ISPname,
  FROM ISPdata
  ORDER BY ISPrank, linBin

panels.title: Download MinRTT (linear mS) per top ${rank} client ISPs and selected sites.

targets.rawSql:
WITH

ISPdata AS (
  SELECT
    bin,
    SUM(hist) AS hist,
    ISPname,
    ISPrank,
  FROM `${dataset}.access_ndt7_cached_histograms`("MinRTT", "${site:regex}", ${rank})
  GROUP BY ISPname, ISPrank, bin
)

SELECT bin,
    CASE "$mode"
      WHEN "pdf" THEN hist / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by ISPname)
      WHEN "peak" THEN hist / MAX(hist) OVER (partition by ISPname)
      ELSE SUM(hist) OVER (PARTITION BY ISPname ORDER BY bin ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by ISPname)
    END AS data,
    ISPname,
  FROM ISPdata
  ORDER BY ISPrank, bin

panels.title: Download MinRTT (mS) per top $rank client ISPs and selected Sites

targets.rawSql:
WITH

ISPdata AS (
  SELECT
    bin,
    SUM(hist) AS hist,
    ISPname,
    ISPrank,
  FROM `${dataset}.access_ndt7_cached_histograms`("MeanThroughputMbps", "${site:regex}", ${rank})
  GROUP BY ISPname, ISPrank, bin
  
)

SELECT bin,
    CASE "$mode"
      WHEN "pdf" THEN hist / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by ISPname)
      WHEN "peak" THEN hist / MAX(hist) OVER (partition by ISPname)
      ELSE SUM(hist) OVER (PARTITION BY ISPname ORDER BY bin ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by ISPname)
    END AS data,

  FROM ISPdata

panels.title: Download Mbps per top $rank client ISPs and selected Sites

targets.rawSql:
WITH

ISPdata AS (
  SELECT
    linBin,
    SUM(hist) AS hist,
    siteName,
  FROM `${dataset}.access_ndt7_cached_histograms`("linearMinRTT", "${site:regex}", ${rank})
  WHERE ISPname IN ( "${ClientISP:Sqlstring}" )
  GROUP BY siteName, linBin
)

SELECT linBin,
    CASE "$mode"
      WHEN "pdf" THEN hist / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
      WHEN "peak" THEN hist / MAX(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
      ELSE SUM(hist) OVER (PARTITION BY siteName ORDER BY linBin ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
    END AS data,
    siteName,
  FROM ISPdata
  ORDER BY linBin

SELECT bin,
    CASE "$mode"
      WHEN "pdf" THEN hist / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
      WHEN "peak" THEN hist / MAX(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)
      ELSE SUM(hist) OVER (PARTITION BY siteName ORDER BY bin ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW ) / SUM(hist) OVER (partition by siteName)

WITH

panels.title: Download  Mbps per MLab Site for $ClientISP

list.description: Metro picker using cached metadata.   Sorted by continent, country and city, to facilitate comparing nearby metros.
list.label: MLab metros
list.name: site

query.rawSql:
# From: 2024-12-20 Prototype cached site picker  

SELECT
  CONCAT(metro, ' ', ContinentCode, ' ', City, ', ', CountryCode) AS text,
  metro AS value,
FROM (
  SELECT
    REGEXP_EXTRACT(site, '^([a-z]{3})') AS metro,
    ANY_VALUE(ContinentCode) AS ContinentCode,
    ANY_VALUE(City) AS City,
    ANY_VALUE(CountryCode) AS CountryCode,
    -- Uses ${datasource} implicitly
  FROM `${dataset}.cached_metadata`
  GROUP BY metro
  ORDER BY  ContinentCode, CountryCode, metro
)

list.description: Number of ISPs to include - TODO rename the variable
list.label: Client Rows
list.name: rank

query.rawSql:
WITH

ISPdata AS (
  SELECT
    ISPrank,
    ISPname,
    SUM(hist) AS tests,
  -- Uses ${datasource}  Implicitly
  FROM `${dataset}.access_ndt7_cached_histograms`("MinRTT", "${site:regex}", ${rank})
  GROUP BY ISPrank, ISPname
  ORDER BY ISPrank
  
)

SELECT * FROM ISPdata

title: Metro Details Dashboard
